alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:50PM CDT until August 08 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southwestern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 349 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alliance Airport, or 9 miles southeast of Alliance, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Antioch, Miles Lake, Snow Lake, Mumper, Patterson Lake, Lakeside, Herman Lake and Tralnor Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 7. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 116. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
